ItemTooltips.ring_of_regen: To keep you kicking in the jungle and for your fast Soul Ring.
ItemTooltips.tango: To survive the first smaller creep camps.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Health and attack speed to increase your frontline capabilities.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Survivability and pushing power for your spiderlings and the whole team!
ItemTooltips.orchid: Damage, attack speed and a useful silence to win most one versus one battles. Also a replacement for the Soul Ring.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Useful in every teamfight, more health, damage and magic immunity to change the tide of battle.
ItemTooltips.basher: A personal favourite of mine, to stop those pesky snacks from defending all together. Goes through magic immunity.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Endless mana, since you regenerate a lot of health with this Ring and your Nets.
